img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a creature named "Chen Loong" in a snowy environment. The character is wielding a weapon and appears to be using a special attack, as indicated by the blue energy effects surrounding them. The health bar at the bottom of the screen shows "Chen Loong" with a partially depleted health. Various icons and gauges are visible on the screen, indicating the player's abilities and status. The setting is a rocky, snow-covered area near a body of water.
